articles.author: Tara Suter
articles.title: Most disapprove of Trump’s job as president ahead of 100-day mark: Poll - The Hill
articles.description: A majority of Americans disapprove of President Trump’s job performance ahead of his 100th day in office this term, according to a poll released Sunday. Fifty-five percent of Americans surveyed in an NBC News Stay Tuned Poll said they disapprove of Trump’s ha…
